article_title: The Secret to Winning the War on Terror
article_text:
Renown counterterrorism expert, Dr. Sebastian Gorka, reveals how America and the West can defeat jihad in his new book – Defeating Islam: The Winnable War. In our exclusive podcast author interview, Utilizing top-secret Cold War documents, Dr. Gorka offers a unique prescription to dealing with Radical Islamic Terrorism and the need for not just military, but psychological warfare to ultimately bring down the worldwide jihadi network, including ISIS and Al Qaeda.

Listen to our one-on-one interview with Dr. Gorka as he reveals these groundbreaking counterterrorism strategies and discusses which 2016 presidential candidates truly understand the threat of Radical Islam and which ones have the best strategy to do so.
